explanation: The 'home' function processes form submissions and displays blog posts.
It validates the form and, upon success, adds a new blog post to the database.
The function also handles user feedback through flash messages.
response.hook: Handles GET and POST requests for the home page.
response.next_click: Explore the MessageForm class for form validation details.
response.pitfall: Ensure proper error handling for form submissions to enhance user experience.
response.title: Home Function in Flask Application
response.why_it_matters: This function is crucial for user interaction, allowing users to submit content and view existing posts.
